I am a senior lecturer (Australian system) in the [Research School of Finance, Actuarial Studies & Statistics](https://www.rsfas.anu.edu.au/) at the [Australian National University](http://www.anu.edu.au/) and an affiliate associate professor in the [Department of Statistical Sciences and Operations Research](https://ssor.vcu.edu/) at [Virginia Commonwealth University](https://www.vcu.edu/).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Curriculum Vitae](extraFiles/CVAHW2024.pdf) (follow embedded links to research articles)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I received my Ph.D. from the [Department of Statistics](https://www.stat.washington.edu/) at the [University of Washington](https://www.washington.edu/) in Seattle where I was also a member of the [Center for Statistics and the Social Sciences](https://www.csss.washington.edu/). My research interests include Bayesian methodology and theory, network and relational data, game theoretic data, inference (uncertainty quantification) for agent based stochastic computer simulation models, and statistical causality.
